short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Double click on any element, edit the text and export an .html file. That simple. Created by Edenspiekermann_.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool that allows copywriters, web professionals and other kinds of primates to edit the text directly on a webpage. 
- Double click on the text you want to alter and edit freely
- Click on the "Download your changes" button to grab an .html file (don't worry, CSS styles will work just fine â€“ we took care of that)
- Send it to your developer and celebrate a new era of stress and change-spreadsheets free collaboration

* It works on localhost served sites too! :)
